title: "Ottawa, Canada"
---

The Second Rome.

```{r out.width='100%', echo=FALSE}
parliament <- paste("<b>Parliament</b>")
byward <- paste("<b>Byward Market</b>")
museumOfCivilization <- paste("<b>Museum of Civilization</b>")
naturalHistory <- paste("<b>Natural History Museum</b>")
library(leaflet)
leaflet() %>% addTiles() %>%
  setView(28.990744, 41.019153, zoom = 12) %>%
  addMarkers(28.980021, 41.008484, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = parliament) %>%
  addMarkers(28.981021, 41.008484, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = byward) %>%
  addMarkers(28.982021, 41.008484, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = museumOfCivilization) %>%
  addMarkers(28.983021, 41.008484, icon = greenDotIcon, popup = naturalHistory)
```
